commands: cd demo/ng/apps/mob && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms www plugins ios android package-lock.json && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json
npx sinbix clean demo-ng-apps-mob && npx sinbix build demo-ng-apps-mob
npx sinbix prepare demo-ng-apps-mob && cd demo/ng/apps/mob && npx cap add android
cd demo/ng/apps/mob && npx cap open android
npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P demo/nest/db/tsconfig.lib.json node_modules/.bin/typeorm migration:{args.cm}
npx sinbix migration demo-nest-db --cm='create --config demo/nest/db/auth/auth.ormconfig.ts -d demo/nest/db/auth/migrations -n {args.name}'
npx sinbix migrate-auth demo-nest-db && npx sinbix migration demo-nest-db --cm='generate --config demo/nest/db/auth/auth.ormconfig.ts -d demo/nest/db/auth/migrations -n {args.name}'
npx sinbix make-migration-auth demo-nest-db --name=update && npx sinbix migrate-auth demo-nest-db
